mapper.insert: insert into studyroom (studyno, studytitle, subjectcode, membercnt, locationcode, managerid, content) values ((select nvl(max(studyno),0)+1 from studyroom), #{studytitle}, #{subjectcode}, #{membercnt}, #{locationcode}, #{managerid}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from (select studyno from studyroom order by studyno desc) where rownum = 1

select s.studyno,s.studytitle,s.subjectcode,s.membercnt,s.locationcode,s.managerid,s.regdate,s.state,s.content,s.viewcnt, c.categorycode,c.subjectname,l.loc1 || ' ' || l.loc2 as location from studyroom s, subcategory c, location l where s.subjectcode = c.subjectcode and s.subjectcode=#{s.subjectcode} and s.locationcode = l.locationcode

select s.studyno, s.studytitle, s.subjectcode, s.membercnt, s.locationcode, s.managerid, s.regdate, s.state, s.content, s.viewcnt, u.categorycode, u.subjectname, l.loc1 || ' ' || l.loc2 as location from studyroom s, subcategory u, category c, location l where s.subjectcode = u.subjectcode and u.categorycode = c.categorycode and c.categorycode=#{c.categorycode} and s.locationcode = l.locationcode
